body: Hey mc and me in same boat dony mind certain things but crossdressing na ha
God, I wish my brother died and left me with a big dick futa gf...
THEY HAD US IN THE FIRST HALF

I actually find it hot exactly because it's kinda emasculating, I mean, I'm not exactly attracted to dicks but there is something really exciting about a woman making you be the exclusive receiving partner in the relationship, it feels very submissive and it's particularly degrading to be forced into the woman's role by a woman specifically.

There's nothing wrong with male being submissive within a relationship with a female. Its not gay either. Although, it's also ok with people feeling weird or emasculated as well because that is their opinion i mean everybody is different but my point is clearly that guess what?? men being the submissive is ALSO OK TO! There are men who don't get emasculated. And also for people who don't like this concept here's something you can do. DON'T FUCKING READ IT.
@Dufixu, on the contrary, I'm iffy about it BECAUSE it's a girl fucking him in the ass. I can live with a guy doing it...but not a woman.
Same, RandomDude801. Especially if it has a clear otome-like art style like this one.
I've always been iffy about futa doujinshii where the male is the uke...feels emasculating.
You're not wrong, @Tripple-H, but it simply strikes me as odd or funny
@Feddric0 these are two completely different and independent things.
@the annoying 1 Nah, it happened to me, and it made it even better.
Don't you hate it when you finally get your brother's wife but then find it she's a futa with a thing for men?
There is no homo... I suppose

So being railed is ok, but crossdressing is the line?

Weird standards.
Woah this is fantastic, I'm glad it got translated.
finally been waiting so long for this to get translated thanks hennojin
